Question 92) Taking advantage of his social status and the possible influence on his fans, the famous musician Jimi Hendrix associates, in his text, the terms Love, Power and Peace to justify his opinion that
A) Peace has the power to increase love among men.
B) Love for power must be smaller than the power of love.
C) Power must be shared among those who love each other.
D) Love for power is able to disunite more and more people.
E) Peace will be achieved when the search for power ceases to exist.
